data.actual_result: The field with nickname and server is bigger than the field behind it.
data.expected_result: Field with the nickname shouldn't go beyond the edge.
data.short_description: [iPhone only] Mutual servers: Long server nicknames let the field go beyond the edge
data.steps_to_repro: - Have or a give a user a very long server nickname like `WWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWW` - Open the profile of this user - Go to `Mutual servers` - Observe the field with the nickname
